summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 2, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an out-count form, an inmate roster, and multiple count slips, all related to the routine inmate population management and headcount procedures at the facility.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with a total count of 766 inmates verified.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 2, 2019, which is the day Jeffrey Epstein was found deceased in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The forms show routine administrative prison operations, including inmate counts and roster management.
The total inmate count recorded was 766, with verification showing 765.
The inmate roster includes a category for 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (likely Suicide Observation or Unassigned).
These are standard Bureau of Prisons forms (NYMES 530.03, NYMES 530.05) used for daily facility operations.
